meanings.sent1: The girl wore a swanky dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The boutique displayed a swanky collection of clothes.
meanings.sent3: Everyone admired the swanky outfit at the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: The swanky accessories added a touch of glamour to her look.
meanings.sent5: The swanky hat completed his trendy ensemble.

meanings.sent1: The hotel room had a swanky chandelier.
meanings.sent2: The mansion had a swanky interior design.
meanings.sent3: She felt like royalty in the swanky limousine.
meanings.sent4: The swanky ballroom was fit for a princess.
meanings.sent5: The swanky yacht sailed gracefully on the water.

meanings.definition: To show off in a flashy or ostentatious manner
meanings.sent1: He liked to swanky his new car around the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She would often swanky her expensive jewelry at events.
meanings.sent3: The peacock swankied its colorful feathers to attract a mate.
meanings.sent4: The magician swankied his tricks to impress the audience.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity loved to swanky her designer outfits on social media.
